text: (haan) aur un logon se baazapurs hogee kya un logon ne khuda ko chhodakar kuchh aur maabood bana rakhe hain (ai rasool) tum kaho ki bhala apanee daleel to pesh karo jo mere (zamaane mein) saath hai unakee kitaab (kuraan) aur jo log mujh se pahale the unakee kitaaben (tauret vagairah) ye (maujood) hain (unamen khuda ka shareek bata do) balki unamen se aksar to haq (baat) ko to jaanate hee nahin
